content: the **tunisian crochet christmas potholders** are beautifully crafted in a cozy scandinavian style designed to bring festive cheer to your kitchen this holiday season the pattern combines **tunisian crochet** **cross-stitch embroidery** the pattern includes a detailed tutorial on how to cross-stitch on tunisian crochet tss fabric **sewing** optional to line the back of the potholders and fix the natural curling of tunisian crochet an alternative to sewing is doubling your potholder with a second layer of tunisian crochet *this pattern is written in us terms* > this pattern will be featured in the > 2025 giftstravaganza blog hop with > underground crafter visit the main > blog hop page ** here 1 ** to learn > all about the hop get all the amazing > free patterns and enter for a chance > to win one of the giveaway prizes **materials** sport 2 fine yarn 3 5 mm e/4 us 9 uk tunisian crochet hook at least 6″ 15 cm long 2 5 mm h/8 us 6 uk crochet hook tapestry needle **yarn** i used schachenmayr catania 137 yds / 125 m per 50 g in the following colors and amounts **red** weinrot 192 52 yds / 47 5 m **blue** marine 124 52 yds / 47 5 m **green** agave 244 52 yds / 47 5 m
